app_description: Easy Translate is a quick simple online translator for multiple languages. Text translation translate between 26 languages by typing or voice recording. Instant Camera Translation translate text in images by pointing your camera on. Conversation Translation a split screen mode for two participants having a bilingual conversation. Translations between 26 languages are supported English Chinese Japanese Korean French Spanish Thai Arabic Russian Portuguese German Italian Greek Dutch Polish Bulgarian Estonian Danish Finnish Czech Romanian Slovenian Swedish Hungarian Vietnamese Some features are not available in all languages. Internet connection is required. Support yuanchuangdev yahoo.com
